name: ChildrenStories

skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: children stories
des: Children Stories. Skill is designed to provide life lessons to children and young kids by telling interesting short stories. Kids can listen to various stories and understand the core message behind them which they can adopt in their day to day life. After the story. there is a question answer round which will test their understanding of the story.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
